title: Strap 0084 to 0005
message: I need to replace 0084 to 0005 with 4 vram minix. What resistors I should remove or add?

title: Strap 0084 to 0005
message: First try it without touching anything, if there are issues install R8613

message:

title: Strap 0084 to 0005
message: I installed R8613 and same thing. Same thing before and after replacing the GPU.
